Subject: Critical issue: Critical api issue in search-api (us-west-2)

Automated detection from monitoring system:

The search-api in the us-west-2 region is experiencing critical backend failures, specifically affecting the authentication endpoint (/api/v1/auth/login). This issue is likely due to overload or a bug in the authentication service, as indicated by the recurring 500 status code. As a result, customers are unable to log in to the application, which may lead to loss of access to services and decreased user satisfaction.

Service: search-api
Region: us-west-2
Severity: critical
